title: Lee Sin Q Bug Patch 6.20

embed.description: I experienced this bug last game while feeeding as lee sin kappa. i hit the enemy leesin with the q didnt want to go in because it was dangerous. i saw the jinx rocket so i was going to wait for it to hit so i could get the execute leesponge kappa.

body:
I experienced this bug last game while feeeding as lee sin{{champion:64}}  kappa. i hit the enemy leesin{{champion:64}}   with the q didnt want to go in because it was dangerous. i saw the jinx rocket{{champion:222}}   so i was going to wait for it to hit so i could get the execute leesponge {{champion:64}} kappa. eventually i had to reactivate it and hope jinx ult {{champion:222}} hit first but we both hit at the same time and for some odd reason i got teleported to the far side of the wall and lee{{champion:64}}  lived making me very sad. I cry..{{item:3070}} 

(sorry if it ended too abruptly)

replies.body:
Hey there,

Wow, that definitely seems like an odd bug.

I would recommend heading over to the [Report a Bug board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) on the NA site and making a thread there, be sure to check out the "[How to Report a Game Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/3mQGBEjA-how-to-report-a-game-bug)" thread before posting.
Yea I already did thanks for the advice though, also it was fixed 6.21 which is good.
